### Diferentially expressed genes

```{r tables, include=T, echo = F, results='asis',  out.width= "100%"}
max_rows = 5000
df = lapply(result_array_ids, function(x) {
 x %>% filter(padj < fdr)
})

for(x in names(df)) {
  number_rows = dim(df[[x]])[1]
  display_rows = ifelse(number_rows > max_rows, max_rows, number_rows)
  rownames(df[[x]]) = NULL
  t = DT::datatable(df[[x]], caption = paste0("Differentially expressed genes for condition: ",x))  %>% formatRound(columns = c(5:9), digits=4)
  cat(knitr::knit_print(t))
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
